greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, primes not dividing n; A054521 * (A061397 * 0^(n-k)), 1<=k<=n.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A054521 * (A061397 * 0^(n-k)), 1<=k<=n. T(n,k) = prime if k is prime but does not divide n. A054521 = a triangle with row sums phi(n). A061397 = (0, 2, 3, 0, 5, 0, 7,...)
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Row 8 has 3 primes < 8 not dividing 8: (3, 5, 7); where (3 + 5 + 7) = A066911(8).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 28 2008
